TopicTitle: And here I thought I'd get to play Fall of The Samurai next week. Thx alot KSP..

Articles.Content:
Why u gotta tease me?

I was planning on buying FoTS next week, dammit! I was looking forward to it!

Then you have to come along and tease with terrain updates and with 'oh lulz we think it will be ready for release tomorrow'.

Now I can\'t buy FoTS. I can\'t sit there and play with samurai knowing that there\'s a fresh Mun to land on.

I have to buy this instead. You bastards. >

<3
Now for stage two of the plan... >
